venue.name: Riverview Restaurant at the Hudson Portuguese Club

item.description:
Homemade Portuguese Wine and appetizer tastings & contest followed by dancing.

7:00 pm to 9:00 pm - Tastings
9:00 pm to 12:00 pm - Dancing

Everyone over 21 years old is welcome.

Tickets
$15.00 (Pre-purchased, availabe onlline http://www.hudsonportugueseclub.org/)
$20.00 (Purchased at door)


Taste, savor and enjoy homemade wines and appetizers made by contestants.

Interested in participating in the wine and/or appetizer contest, please email Luisa Fontes at secretary@hudsonportugueseclub.org .

*********************************************
I know this is a little out the way for most of you.

I visited this club before and the grounds are beautiful. The landscaping is amazing. It also has a Portuguese restaurant. The restaurant is a very small part of this club. The grounds contains several function halls, a bar, a gym, outdoor patio, and even a shrine with a waterfall/river dedicated to the Lady of Fatima.

http://www.hudsonport...

******************************************

 [url= www.hudsonportugueseclub.org] www.hudsonportugueseclub.org http://www.riverviewh...[/url]
item.why: This should be fun! Good food and drink! and dancing! Check out the flyer, http://www.hudsonportugueseclub.org/Englisher%20flyer%202011.pdf

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Homemade Portuguese Wine and Food Tastings and Dancing
